title: Quinoxaline-Benzothiadiazole Heterotrimer Enabling Organic Solar Cells with Extraordinary Efficiency and Stability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00860J, Paper
Yanming Sun, Jinfeng Liu, Xiaopeng Duan, Jiali Song, Chunhui Liu, Min Hun Jee, Han Young Woo, Jiaxin Gao, Zheng Tang
Organic solar cells (OSCs) based on oligomer acceptors have garnered significant interest for their notable power conversion efficiency (PCE) and enduring stability. Despite their great potential, the development of oligomer...
